itemDescription: British swimmer, Olympic athlete, world championships silver medallist

wikipedia_page.main:
Andrew Roy Philip Hunter (born 25 July 1986) is a British former competitive swimmer and freestyler who represented Great Britain at the Olympics, FINA world championships and European championships, and Scotland in the Commonwealth Games.
At the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing, he swam for the British men's team in the 4×200-metre freestyle relay swimming, which came sixth in the event finals.
